definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: The pearls are all about the same size. It's quite a short necklace.
sentences.chinese: 是由小颗的珍珠串起来的很短的项链。

sentences.english: Mrs Hollister : My sister gave me those pearls.
sentences.chinese: 我姐姐给我的珍珠项链，怎么也找不到。

sentences.english: The tower-shaped necklace looks so nice.
Did he take away the jade bracelets and agate necklace i gave you last week ?
sentences.chinese: 他有没有拿走上个礼拜我给你的玉镯子和玛瑙项链？

sentences.english: This is what makes this necklace special and standing out of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 这个就是什么使得这条项链特殊而站人群中挤出来的。

sentences.english: Backwards look like a small horn, like a string of beautiful necklace.
sentences.chinese: 倒着看像一个小喇叭，又像一串串美丽的项链。

sentences.english: Example: She plunked down $250 for a silver necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她花费了250元买了条银项链。

sentences.english: The sister cried her eyes out at the loss of her necklace.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐丢了项链以后，哭得死赴活来。

sentences.english: Her last chance at winning any necklace is Amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一有机会能赢下的是紫水晶项链。

sentences.english: Think studs and a pearl necklace, if you must wear jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须戴首饰，就考虑耳钉和珍珠项链。

sentences.english: It's a simple solid-silver piece at the end of that cord necklace.
sentences.chinese: 这只不过是一根普通的带有银质吊坠的吊绳项链。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of a pearl necklace?
sentences.chinese: 你有听过珍珠项链的比喻吗？

sentences.english: That's very steep for a necklace.
sentences.chinese: 一根项链卖这个价钱太贵了。

sentences.english: He handed me a necklace last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚他送给我一条项链。

sentences.english: Link a work item to a changeset or a file that is under version control.
sentences.chinese: 将工作项链接到处于版本控制下的变更集或文件。

sentences.english: A gold necklace with intricate depictions of animals.
sentences.chinese: 一条刻有未知神兽的金项链。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
